markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs=""
>
[Impossible Cake](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1312)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 46</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) “Type of item” refers to a broad category of items such as books, spells, etc, not a specific object._

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This sleight-of-hand for the taste buds is flavored with absinthe and honey and always resembles something completely unlike a cake, from a pile of armor to a bowl of soup. Eating the cake gives you the confidence to make the impossible seem possible: for 10 minutes after the meal, you gain a +2 item bonus to your [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) checks to [Impersonate](/Actions.aspx?ID=46), as well as to [Lie](/Actions.aspx?ID=47) to convince others that you possess knowledge about the type of item that the cake resembles.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Impossible Cake
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 46</row>

**Price** 5 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Impossible Cake (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 46</row>

**Price** 25 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The item bonus is +3 and the effect lasts 30 minutes.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Impossible Cake (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 46</row>

**Price** 2,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The item bonus is +4 and the effect lasts 1 hour.
name: Impossible Cake (Major)
